item.description:
Transformational Breathwork Group.
Regular weekly group in Boston area. Open to general audiences. Please RSVP to secure spot.

To read more about Transformational Breathwork please check this meetup intro & board.

If you chose to enroll into breathwork sessions, attending free meetup meetings is recommended as they will provide excellent venue for support and sharing experiences.

One-to-one sessions also available, please inquire.

Please feel free to email with any questions.

Elena

Group session fees:
$40 for single session.
$175 for 5 sessions.
$300 for 10 sessions.
No expiration, no weekly attendance requirements.

10 consecutive sessions are recommended for best cumulative effect, and
as the most efficient approach to accelerate your personal growth and learning,
enabling you to do breathwork on your own. This unique, simple and accessible
healing and spiritual growth modality will become your lifestyle.
item.name: Transformational Breahtwork Group session
